PHRASE.LANG: Only S.V.E.R. can provide chairs that are not only surprisingly comfortable, but can also be used a close-combat weapons in a pinch ... as this one obviously has. [#Legal]
Seul S.V.E.R. est capable de proposer des chaises étonnamment confortables et susceptibles de se transformer en armes en un clin d'œil. À l'image de celle-ci. [#Legal]

Nur S.V.E.R. versteht es, einen Stuhl zu entwickeln, der nicht nur überraschend komfortabel ist, sondern zur Not auch als Nahkampfwaffe eingesetzt werden kann – wie es bei diesem Exemplar offensichtlich bereits der Fall war. [#Legal]

Solo la S.V.E.R. riesce ad offrire delle sedie comodissime utilizzabili anche come armi d'emergenza nel combattimento ravvicinato. Questa sedia ha sicuramente svolto in pieno la sua funzione. [#Legal]
Solo S.V.E.R. podría vender sillas que además de ser cómodas pueden utilizarse como arma en combates cuerpo a cuerpo. Esta la han usado unas cuantas veces. [#Legal]
あらゆる状況に備え、近接戦時の武器として使えるこの椅子は、意外に座り心地が良い。セイバーらしい発想だ。 [#Legal]
오직 S.V.E.R. 만이 편안하면서도 위기의 순간에 백병전 무기로 사용할 수 있는 의자를 만들 수 있습니다. 물론 이 의자도 마찬가지입니다. [#Legal]
Only SVER can provide chairs that are not only surprisingly comfortable, but can also be used as close-combat weapons in a pinch. As this one obviously has. [#Legal]
這款意想不到地舒適，而且可以在必要時用作近身戰武器的椅子，只有SVER可以提供。 [#Legal]
這款意想不到地舒適，而且可以在必要時用作近身戰武器的椅子，只有SVER可以提供。 [#Legal]
Only SVER can provide chairs that are not only surprisingly comfortable, but can also be used as close-combat weapons in a pinch. As this one obviously has. [#Legal]
